message: Uhmm are we trying to turn convore into the wild west known as Facebook groups yea that will be fun and everyone will complain about it nice

i concur with @italiano40.  I don't want anyone adding me to groups i didn't ask to be in, (invites at worst. you can tell them to join.)  also I don't want someone else controlling what alerts i receive in my inbox.  It's mine for me to choose. don't choose cause you think you know better.
